DOC.brief_summary: The study collect information patient chart patient questionnaire evaluate effect nerve stimulation therapy urinary dysfunction .
DOC.detailed_description: Men woman urinary incontinence ( leakage urine ) , frequency , bladder pain experience embarrassment , inconvenience , significant negative impact quality life . Although traditional treatment medication , diet modification , bladder training provide relief people , others experience improvement treatment . Recently , mechanical device much like heart pacemaker develop stimulate nerve ( sacral pudendal ) responsible control bladder function . During two stage operation , permanent electrical wire implant low back connected mechanical box ( stimulator ) implant patient skin hip area . Participants ask complete set questionnaire ( Intake Form , Urinary Incontinence Treatment Network ( UITN ) Sexual Activity Questionnaire , Interstitial Cystitis Symptom Index Problem Index , void diary ) within 60 day prior procedure . Preoperative clinical information primary diagnosis , history fail therapy , medical history collect physician office record , operative information collect inpatient hospital record . After two stage operation ( 3 , 6 , 12 month , yearly thereafter long device place ) participant send questionnaire . Upon completion return study site
DOC.criteria: All patient least 18 year age schedule sacral nerve stimulator implantation William Beaumont Hospital , Royal Oak , Michigan give inform consent participate project .
